3.45 pm: Afternoon, Josh Halliday here taking over from Matthew Weaver . This just in: Chancellor George Osborne has been defending Andy Coulson .`` Andy Coulson did a good job as director of communications,'' he said. There was never any complaints about how he did that job- which is pretty unique when you look at the people who've done that job in the past. It was George Osborne , you might recall, who personally suggested hiring Andy Coulson in 2007 after his resignation as editor of News of the World. 2.54 pm: My colleagues James Robinson and Vikram Dodd have the " The head of the Metropolitan police said today that`` no stone will be left unturned in the fresh investigation into the News of the World phone hacking allegations announced yesterday, four years after the initial convictions in the case.
